decision_conditions: The proposed changes would materially alter the design of the budling. It would also affect the neighbouring properties. The proposed amendments can therefore not be treated as a non-material amendment to Planning Permission ref. 190013FUL dated 26/02/2019 in accordance with Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Paragraph 130 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2019), and the Ealing Protocol for Non-Material Amendments Following a Grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow Alteration to 3no. flank window privacy screens on the south facing elevation of the front block of 13 flats in relation to planning permission reference PP/2014/1045 dated 03/03/2017 for 'Redevelopment of the site (following demolition of petrol station and garages) to provide 20 residential units in total, consisting of 13 flats (1x1 bedroom, 11x2 bedroom and 1x3 bedroom) in a five storey block at the front of the site; and 7x2 bedroom 2 storey mews houses to the rear of the site.'
